title: &mpersand

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In Position (Infinite): Select three people each night. If any are visited by an Agent, they will also be roleblocked. You will learn which targets were successfully roleblocked, if any. May be multitasked with another night ability.
- Antagonize (3-shot): Select a player to permanently frame as a non-Agent role. If you target an Agent, this will instead grant them detection immunity.
- One Stone (1-shot): Choose two targets during the night. If your first is hanged the following day, the second is immediately dealt an Unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Morality Error (Passive): All Agents have detection immunity and all Town members are framed as random Agent roles on Night 1.
- One for None (Passive): Whenever a Town member is hanged, all Agents gain an increase in their defense tier the following night and will be lynchproof the next day.
- You have roleblock immunity.
